contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Tōwa'''|東和町|Tōwa-chō}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Ōshima District, Yamaguchi|Ōshima District]], [[Yamaguchi Prefecture|Yamaguchi]], [[Japan]]. On October 1, 2004 Tōwa was merged with towns of [[Ōshima, Yamaguchi|Ōshima]], [[Kuka, Yamaguchi|Kuka]] and [[Tachibana, Yamaguchi|Tachibana]], all from [[Ōshima District, Yamaguchi|Ōshima District]], to form the new town of [[Suō-Ōshima, Yamaguchi|Suō-Ōshima]]. As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 5,028 and a [[population density|density]] of 129.59 persons per km². The total area was 38.80 km². ==External links== * [http://www.town.suo-oshima.lg.jp/ Official website of Suō-Ōshima] (in Japanese) {{DEFAULTSORT:Towa, Yamaguchi}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Yamaguchi Prefecture]] {{Yamaguchi-geo-stub}}
